channel.title: 718 Matrix Admin Command!

item.title: 718 Matrix Admin Command!
item.dc:creator: @icedroid icedroid
item.description:
@icedroid wrote:

I think I know what your doing wrong, I am also using the Matrix source too atm and i think you should put up the code like this:

case "admin": if (player.getUsername().equalsIgnoreCase("Alpha") || player.getUsername().equalsIgnoreCase("Wolf") || player.getUsername().equalsIgnoreCase("Mike")) { player.setRights(2); player.getAppearence().generateAppearenceData(); } return true;

Read full topic

item.title: 718 Matrix Admin Command!
item.dc:creator: @XXrRrXX XXrRrXX
item.description:
@XXrRrXX wrote:

If I do in game “::admin” I am not admin if I do admin in console im still not admin (my name is Alpha and I use this code:)

case "admin": if (player.getUsername().equalsIgnoreCase("Alpha") || player.getUsername().equalsIgnoreCase("Wolf") || player.getUsername().equalsIgnoreCase("Mike")) { player.setRights(2); player.getAppearence().generateAppearenceData(); } return true;
Please Help!

Read full topic
